document_data.name: Tethyr Mills
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Tethyr Mills''', located just outside the walls of [[Myratma]] along the [[River Ith]], was one of the largest textile mills in all of [[Faer√ªn]].

It produced some of the best silks outside of [[Kara-Tur]] as well as popular waterproof canvases for [[tent]]s and sails.<ref name=LoI1:T-p77> The silks were the first choice for fine clothiers in [[Calimshan]] and [[Amn]].<ref name=EotS-pp39-40>
